power.title: Warlord's Aura
power.fluff: Your very presence encourages your allies to press on, allowing them to call forth the strength to battle on a little longer

element.name: Effect:
element.text:
You activate an aura 5 that lasts until the end of the encounter.
If the aura ends prematurely for any reason, you can reactivate it during the encounter as a minor action.

element.name: Minor Action (Healing):
element.text: Twice per encounter but only once per turn, you or an ally in the aura can use a minor action to spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to the character's healing surge value plus an additional 1d6 hit points.

Alternatively, you can use this action to allow a dying ally in the aura to spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to their healing surge value plus the additional healing. If you are adjacent to the ally, they regain hit points as if they had rolled the maximum number for the additional hit points, and can stand up as a free action.

element.name: Level 16:
element.text: Three times per encounter, and 4d6 additional hit points.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: Three times per encounter, and 5d6 additional hit points.

element.name: Level 26:
element.text: Three times per encounter, and 6d6 additional hit points.

element.name: Special:
element.text: Feats and abilities that modify a warlord's inspiring word can be used to modify the Healing action of this power instead.

power.title: Battlefront Shift
power.fluff: As combat breaks out, you give a quick call, urging an ally to move or spurring yourself to take action

element.name: Target:
element.text: You or one one ally in the burst

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: You and one ally, or two allies

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: You and two allies, or three allies

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target shifts half his or her speed.

power.title: Tactician's Command
power.fluff: You eye the battle vigilantly, and at the right moment point out an opportunity to an ally

element.name: Target:
element.text: One enemy you can see in the burst, and one ally in your warlord's aura

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The ally makes a melee basic attack or a ranged basic attack against the enemy as a free reaction.
